channel.title: B.B. King on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in B.B. King on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sally Tiven, Blues and Soul Guitarist and Songwriter, Dies at 68
item.description: Her career included collaborations with B.B. King, Wilson Pickett, Huey Lewis & the News, Buddy Guy and The Jeff Healey Band.
